question.questionA: Petals azure blue, 25-35 mm; sepals longer than the fruit.
question.questionB: Petals pale blue, 8-12 mm; sepals half as long as the fruit.

question.questionA: Perennials, non-flowering shoots present; petals with a dark spot at the base.
question.questionB: Annuals, non-flowering shoots absent; petals without a dark spot at the base.

question.questionA: Leaves entire; sepals green with white margins.
question.questionB: Leaves denticulate; sepals yellow at the base, green above.
